definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[שַׁסֻּ֫הוּ]] Ps 89:42 they have plundered him; Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיׇּשׁׂ֫סּוּ]] Ju Jdg 2:14 (acc. pers.); 1Sa 17:53 (acc. loc.); pt. sf. [[שׁׂאֲסַיִח]] Je 30:16 Kt (Qr v. [[שׁסה]]), Aram. form, Ges:§ 67 s.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be plundered, rifled, of houses: Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְנׇשַׁ֫סּוּ]] Zec 14:2; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִשַּׁ֫סּוּ]] Is 13:16.
